title: Stencil font similar to H&F's Giant
content: Are there any stencil fonts that are similar to [http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100007](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415214502/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100007 "http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100007")
author: Capnhud

comments.content: [MyFonts search](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415214502/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=stencil) includes Glaser which is sort of similar.

I am not sure how to describe Giant, but it does not have curves in it.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here

These are all good choices but they seem to lack the punch that Giant has.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
What's prohibiting you from purchasing Giant?

I see that I have worded this thread incorrectly. It should be been a stencil font similar to 'Giant Background' not just Giant. I guess I am just being really picky because all that I want is just the background font without highlight or shaded version. That is why I was wondering if there was something else out there.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
